item.description:
October 2008, the Revere Beach Partnership and Kelly’s held the first “Pumpkin Festival on Revere Beach”. The first 250 children chose pumpkins to decorate which were donated by a local farm. Tables were set up with markers, glue, paint, and lots of fun things to attach to their pumpkin.

Silly Willy was there to add a new hat design or two and Halloween-related music was played to get everyone in the mood. Free family pictures were also supplied compliments of the Revere Beach Partnership. Even for October, it was a perfect day to be on the beach.

This year, 2009, the Revere Beach Partnership will be holding the second annual festival. More details will be available as the date gets closer.

In the meantime, you can check out the 1st annual event at www.reverebeach.com/RevereBeach_news_articles.htm#4
item.name: Revere Beach Pumpkin Festival
